Package ohos.agp.render

Class Region

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.agp.render.Region

  • public class Region
extends Object
    Represents a region composed of multiple rectangles.
    Since:
    3

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static class  Region.Op
      Enumerates operation types.

      • op

        public boolean op​(Region regionA,
                  Region regionB,
                  Region.Op op)
        Performs the specified operation on two specified regions.

        If successful, the operation will take effect on the current Region.

        Parameters:
        regionA - Indicates the first region.
        regionB - Indicates the second region.
        op - Indicates the operation to be performed.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the operation is successful; returns false otherwise.
        Since:
        5

      • op

        public boolean op​(int left,
                  int top,
                  int right,
                  int bottom,
                  Region.Op op)
        Performs the specified operation on the current region and a rectangle specified by coordinates.
        Parameters:
        left - Indicates the X coordinate of the upper left corner of the specified rectangle.
        top - Indicates the Y coordinate of the upper left corner of the specified rectangle.
        right - Indicates the X coordinate of the lower right corner of the specified rectangle.
        bottom - Indicates the Y coordinate of the lower right corner of the specified rectangle.
        op - Indicates the operation to be performed.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the operation is successful; returns false otherwise.
        Since:
        5

      • quickReject

        public boolean quickReject​(int left,
                           int top,
                           int right,
                           int bottom)
        Checks whether the current region is empty or does not intersect the rectangle specified by coordinates.
        Parameters:
        left - Indicates the X coordinate of the upper left corner of the specified rectangle.
        top - Indicates the Y coordinate of the upper left corner of the specified rectangle.
        right - Indicates the X coordinate of the lower right corner of the specified rectangle.
        bottom - Indicates the Y coordinate of the lower right corner of the specified rectangle.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the current region is empty or does not intersect the rectangle specified by coordinates; returns false otherwise.
        Since:
        5

      • translate

        public void translate​(int dx,
                      int dy,
                      Region dst)
        Translates this region by a specified distance. If this region is empty, nothing will be done.
        Parameters:
        dx - Indicates the offset of the region on the x-axis.
        dy - Indicates the offset of the region on the y-axis.
        dst - Indicates the destination region after translation.
        Since:
        5
